com.mbc.receiptprinter.process.receipt

Class ReceiptFetchProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mbc.receiptprinter.process.receipt.ReceiptFetchProcess

  • public class ReceiptFetchProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for the fetching of Receipts

    • Method Detail

      • fetchReceipt

        public Receipt fetchReceipt(java.lang.String receiptDate,
                   Address address,
                   Designation designation,
                   java.lang.String amount)
        Fetches a Receipt by it's key fields. The combination of receiptDate, address, designation and amount must be unique in the application
        Parameters:
        receiptDate - The Receipt date
        address - The Address associated with this Receipt
        designation - The Designation associated with this Receipt
        amount - The amount of the Receipt
        Returns:
        The Receipt that contains the given params; otherwise null

      • fetchReceipts

        public java.util.List<Receipt> fetchReceipts()
        Fetches all Receipt records
        Returns:
        A List of all of the Receipt records in the Receipt data file; otherwise an empty list

      • getReceiptData

        public java.lang.Object[][] getReceiptData()
        Formats the Receipt records in such a way as to be able to display them in a table on the user interface
        Returns:
        A two dimensional Object array of Receipt data that is used for display purposes

      • getYearlyReportData

        public java.lang.Object[][] getYearlyReportData(java.lang.String year)
        Gets the total yearly amount per address. The returned data is used in the total yearly amount report
        Parameters:
        year - The year to calculate the total amount per address for
        Returns:
        A two dimensional Object array of total yearly amount data that is used for display purposes

      • getReceiptYears

        public java.lang.String[] getReceiptYears()
        Used for populating the year address combo box on the total yearly amount report
        Returns:
        A String array of receipt years in descending order
